New Records: Glenn Maxwell broke the record for the fastest century in World Cup history with a 40-ball ton
Maxwell's century was the fourth-quickest in ODI history
Key Match Events: Maxwell's innings was a pivotal moment in Australia's 309-run win
Bas de Leede had the worst bowling figures in ODI history
Pre-Game Insights: Maxwell was unwell and didn't want to bat initially due to illness
His performance was a confidence boost after dealing with health issues
Post-Match Reflections: Maxwell's century gave him a significant confidence boost
Australia's win was a morale booster ahead of the World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Arun Jaitley Stadium in Delhi
